entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
